nodes.bodyText: Do we still need to be able to handle both 3.3.1 as well as the previous versions on line 18? Or could we just remove it?

nodes.bodyText: The old version sends the version string to STDOUT so we need that line to capture that and tell the user to upgrade. The new version (3.3.1+) sends it to STDERR so we need to cover both to reliably check the version of yq.
